organizations.title: European Management Institute
organizations.role: Director and Chairman of the Board of Directors
organizations.description: A consulting firm specialized in outsourced management, public policy analysis, and corporate efficiency. It offers selected clients high value-added solutions that are rarely available on the market. European Management has made its mark in the business consulting market by using 'outcome-based' contracts as a competitive tool, which reduce client risk by tying compensation to the actual achievement of agreed-upon business performance targets.

organizations.title: Cooperativa Ermetes SCS
organizations.description: A Trentino-based cooperative with a prevalent mutualistic purpose that supports the employment of disadvantaged individuals through targeted training and fieldwork activities.
organizations.approach: Under the new presidency and management, a new system for measuring social impact was introduced, along with a 'C-level' corporate management system aimed at bringing efficiency and competitiveness by proactively and more directly involving all worker-members.

organizations.title: Sustainable Economy Association ODV
organizations.description: A non-profit organization founded in 2016 in Brussels and later developed in Italy, starting from Trentino where it has its main headquarters. Its mission is to rethink territorial development, public policies, and, more broadly, economic growth from a sustainable perspective, in contrast to the theory of 'happy degrowth' typical of ideological environmentalism. It organizes conferences, advocacy actions, and participates in European and international projects.

publicPolicy.title: Public Policy
publicPolicy.description: Public policy analysis is the activity carried out by specialized experts who systematically study government strategies, decisions, and actions, with the aim of assessing their effectiveness, efficiency, and impact on their clients' interests. Companies rely on these professionals, for example, to better understand the risks and opportunities arising from current or future political and legislative changes, to simulate their impact on business models, and to plan their operations accordingly.

outsourcedManagement.title: Outsourced Management
outsourcedManagement.description: We live in an era of epochal economic, social and technological changes that require new skills and speed of action. Complex factors to obtain without the right investments and using only internal resources.
outsourcedManagement.heroDescription: We live in an era of epochal economic, social and technological changes that require new skills and speed of action. Complex factors to obtain without the right investments and using only internal resources.

content.intro: Outsourced management is the practice of entrusting one or more business operations or entire functions—such as finance, digitalization, tenders and bids, extraordinary transactions, market development, and more—to external experts outside the company. The client’s goal is to reduce costs, increase efficiency, and focus on the core business by delegating activities that require specialized skills not available in-house.
content.approach: We use a "data driven" approach and accept challenging contracts including "outcome based" types, compensated based on agreed performance indicators. This ensures that our clients receive tangible results and measurable improvements.

projects.title: Government of Mozambique Training Program
projects.description: Designed and implemented a comprehensive training program for public officials focused on "Public-Private Partnership for Local Development". The program strengthened institutional capacity and improved governance frameworks, directly contributing to enhanced public service delivery and economic development initiatives.
projects.impact: Trained 50+ government officials, established PPP framework

projects.title: Ship 24 Green & Carbontrack Projects
projects.description: Led the development of integrated digital solutions for measuring, tracking, and reducing environmental impact in international logistics. Created comprehensive CO₂ emission measurement platforms with automated reporting systems, enabling companies to achieve significant decarbonization milestones.
projects.impact: Reduced logistics emissions by 25%, automated reporting for 100+ companies

projects.title: Cooperativa Ermetes Transformation
projects.description: Revolutionized the management structure of Cooperativa Ermetes SCS by implementing a "C-level" business management system with performance-based bonuses and comprehensive social impact measurement. The transformation enhanced operational efficiency while maintaining the cooperative's social mission focus.
projects.impact: 40% increase in placement success, improved worker satisfaction

projects.title: ATI Dolomiti Grow Coordination
projects.description: Provided comprehensive coordination and institutional relations support for a pioneering Trentino startup in the therapeutic cannabis sector. Managed regulatory compliance, business development strategies, and stakeholder engagement to position the company for state cannabis production contracts.
projects.impact: Secured regulatory approvals, established government partnerships

socialImpact.title: Social Impact and Vision

images.alt: Social impact activities in North Africa

socialImpact.description: Economy and finance, in and of themselves, are meaningless unless they generate a positive impact on people, society, and the planet. This belief has led me to invest a large part of my income in activities with a positive and measurable social impact. I’ve never fully believed in charity carried out by third parties through donations; for this reason, I prefer to personally dedicate part of my time to concrete local volunteer work and international cooperation initiatives.
